Ryo

NCT

Introduction

Ryo is a Japanese singer under SM Entertainment. He is a member of NCT and it's Japan based sub-unit NCT Wish.

On July 10, 2023, Ryo was announced as one of the contestants in SM Entertainment's NCT UNIVERSE : LASTART, along with Riku.

Fun facts

1
Ryo frequently introduces himself by saying "annyeonghaseryo (안녕하세료)" instead of "안녕하세요/annyeonghaseyo (meaning hello)".
